mapper.sql: SELECT Count(*) over () filtered_count, p.pr_no, p.ttl, p.pr_typecd, p.tax_typecd, p.io_flag, To_date(p.dlv_fr_ymd, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dlv_fr_ymd, To_date(p.dlv_to_ymd, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dlv_to_ymd, p.dlv_loc, To_date(p.dlv_req_ymd, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dlv_req_ymd, p.spot_dscr_yn, To_date(p.spot_dscr_dt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS spot_dscr_dt, p.spot_dscr_usrnm, p.spot_dscr_usrtel, p.spot_dscr_loc, p.req_usr_nm, p.req_usr_tel, p.gm_chrgr_cd, p.pr_chrgr_cd, p.gr_chrgr_cd, p.chk_chrgr_cd, To_date(p.reg_dt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS reg_dt, p.pr_rmrk, p.return_yn, To_date(p.return_dt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS return_dt, p.return_rmrk, p.prebid_yn, To_date(p.e4u_if_dt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS e4u_if_dt, p.erp_sync_yn, To_date(p.erp_sync_dt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS erp_sync_dt, p.erp_pr_no, p.erp_rfq_no, p.bid_sub_typecd, p.bid_typecd FROM agt_pr p LEFT JOIN agt_user gmUser ON( p.gm_chrgr_cd = gmUser.user_cd ) LEFT JOIN agt_user prUser ON( p.pr_chrgr_cd = prUser.user_cd ) LEFT JOIN agt_user grUser ON( p.gr_chrgr_cd = grUser.user_cd ) LEFT JOIN agt_user chkUser ON( p.chk_chrgr_cd = chkUser.user_cd )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM agt_pr WHERE sub_org_cd like #{agtCd} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agt_pr ( pr_no, ttl, pr_typecd, tax_typecd, io_flag, gm_chrgr_cd, pr_chrgr_cd, gr_chrgr_cd, chk_chrgr_cd, dlv_fr_ymd, dlv_to_ymd, req_usr_nm, req_usr_tel, reg_dt, pr_rmrk, dlv_loc, dlv_req_ymd, return_yn, return_dt, return_rmrk, spot_dscr_yn, spot_dscr_dt, spot_dscr_usrnm, spot_dscr_usrtel, spot_dscr_loc, prebid_yn, e4u_if_dt, erp_pr_no, erp_rfq_no, sub_org_cd ) SELECT dp.e4u_pr_no, dp.ttl, dp.pr_typecd, dp.tax_typecd, dp.io_flag, gmUser.e4u_user_cd AS gm_chrgr_cd, prUser.e4u_user_cd AS pr_chrgr_cd, grUser.e4u_user_cd AS gr_chrgr_cd, chkUser.e4u_user_cd AS chk_chrgr_cd, dp.dlv_fr_ymd, dp.dlv_to_ymd, dp.req_usr_nm, dp.req_usr_tel, dp.reg_dt, dp.pr_rmrk, dp.dlv_loc, dp.dlv_req_ymd, 'N', NULL, NULL, dp.spot_dscr_yn, dp.spot_dscr_dt, dp.spot_dscr_usrnm, dp.spot_dscr_usrtel, dp.spot_dscr_loc, dp.prebid_yn, dp.e4u_if_dt, dp.erp_pr_no, dp.erp_rfq_no, dp.sub_org_cd FROM agt_dum_pr dp LEFT JOIN agt_dum_user gmUser ON( dp.gm_chrgr_cd = gmUser.erp_user_cd ) LEFT JOIN agt_dum_user prUser ON( dp.pr_chrgr_cd = prUser.erp_user_cd ) LEFT JOIN agt_dum_user grUser ON( dp.gr_chrgr_cd = grUser.erp_user_cd ) LEFT JOIN agt_dum_user chkUser ON( dp.chk_chrgr_cd = chkUser.erp_user_cd ) WHERE dp.erp_pr_no = #{erpPrNo}

INSERT INTO agt_pr ( pr_no, ttl, pr_typecd, tax_typecd, io_flag, gm_chrgr_cd, pr_chrgr_cd, gr_chrgr_cd, chk_chrgr_cd, dlv_fr_ymd, dlv_to_ymd, req_usr_nm, req_usr_tel, reg_dt, pr_rmrk, dlv_loc, dlv_req_ymd, return_yn, return_dt, return_rmrk, spot_dscr_yn, spot_dscr_dt, spot_dscr_usrnm, spot_dscr_usrtel, spot_dscr_loc, prebid_yn, e4u_if_dt, erp_pr_no, erp_rfq_no ) VALUES ( #{prNo}, #{ttl}, #{prTypecd}, #{taxTypecd}, #{ioFlag}, #{gmChrgrCd} , #{prChrgrCd} , #{grChrgrCd} , #{chkChrgrCd} , NULL, NULL, #{reqUsrNm}, #{reqUsrTel}, To_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{prRmrk}, #{dlvLoc}, To_char(#{dlvReqYmd}, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'N', NULL, NULL, #{spotDscrYn}, To_char(#{spotDscrDt}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{spotDscrUsrnm}, #{spotDscrUsrtel}, #{spotDscrLoc}, #{prebidYn}, To_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{erpPrNo}, #{erpRfqNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE agt_pr SET pr_chrgr_cd = (SELECT I.user_cd FROM agt_user I WHERE I.e4u_user_cd = #{prChrgrCd}), gm_chrgr_cd = (SELECT I.user_cd FROM agt_user I WHERE I.e4u_user_cd = #{gmChrgrCd}), gr_chrgr_cd = (SELECT I.user_cd FROM agt_user I WHERE I.e4u_user_cd = #{grChrgrCd}), chk_chrgr_cd = (SELECT I.user_cd FROM agt_user I WHERE I.e4u_user_cd = #{chkChrgrCd}) WHERE pr_no = #{prNo}

choose.when: { CALL EBIZ.P_APC_EBIZ_PR_REG( #{prNo, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notiKind, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outCd, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outMsg, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) }
